title: Select 8 Function Block
description: This function block handles the selection of one of eight output signals based on input conditions such as rising edge, falling edge, and reset conditions. It allows for incrementing and decrementing of a state variable, which determines which output is enabled.
name: SELECT_8

input.name: E
input.description: Enable input for the function block.

input.name: SET
input.description: Sets the state variable to the value of IN when TRUE.

input.name: IN
input.description: Input value used to set the state variable.

input.name: UP
input.description: Increment the state variable when TRUE and the last UP was FALSE.

input.name: DN
input.description: Decrement the state variable when TRUE and the last DN was FALSE.

input.name: RST
input.description: Resets the state variable to 0 when TRUE.
